Title: Restricts the use of wireless communication devices by students on school property
Summary: Prohibits students from accessing their wireless communications devices on school property, unless authorized for classroom use; prohibits students from accessing social media platforms through the use of internet access provided by the school district, except when expressly directed to for class instruction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to restricting the use of wireless communication devices by students on school property
